# identifier

**Instance Property**

An identifier that uniquely identifies a data store.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var identifier: UUID? { get }
```

## Inspecting data store properties

- **isPersistent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this object stores data to disk.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether this object stores data to disk.
